alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Iron (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 17 at 9:35AM CDT until April 17 at 12:00PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Tyler Forks near Tyler Forks River at Stricker Road near Mellen affecting Ashland and Iron Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... St. Louis River at Scanlon affecting Carlton County. .Additional snow melt will continue to lead to river flooding and elevated flows. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Elevated flows are expected to continue. * WHERE...Tyler Forks Tyler Forks River at Stricker Road near Mellen. * WHEN...Until this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 9.8 feet, At this level ST HWY 169 is likely impacted by flood water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM CDT Monday the stage was 8.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall and remain below flood stage. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 8.8 feet on 04/03/2020. - Flood safety information can be found at www.weather.gov/safety/flood. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Tyler Forks Tyler Forks River at Stricke 9.0 8.7 Mon 8 am CDT 7.9 6.5 5.7 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/duluth. The next statement will be issued this afternoon by 1200 PM CDT.
